row.entry: This module allows to enhance local contrast. It uses the unnormalized bilateral filter and works on the L channel from Lab.

sect4.title: Usage
sect4.para: Local contrast boosts the details of your image much like the equalizer does, but in only one frequency band.

sect5.title: coarseness
sect5.para: Make the details you want to adjust finer or coarser (this maps to sigma_s in the algorithm).

sect5.title: contrast
sect5.para: How strongly the algorithm distinguishes between brightness levels (maps to sigma_r in the algorithm). Increasing the value will result in a more contrasty look.

sect5.title: detail
sect5.para: Add or remove detail. higher values will increase local contrast.

row.entry: After, a little overdone to demonstrate the effect. Use this sparingly to avoid a cheap overprocessed look.
